metadata.title: CVE-2023-4532 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from16.2 before 16.2.8, all versions starting from 16.3 before 16.3.5, allversions starting from 16.4 before 16.4.1. Users were capable of linkingCI/CD jobs of private projects which they are not a member of.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
